headline: Analyst Explains Why He’s Buying Qualcomm (QCOM) Despite Fading Hopes of Cellphone ‘Super Cycle’
summary: Jim Lebenthal from CNBC Investment Committee explained in a recent program why he’s buying Qualcomm Inc (NASDAQ:QCOM) despite not having much hope for the cellphone market: “Qualcomm, it’s a little bit different in that the earnings revisions are very slightly upwards, but there I’m being anticipatory and I think those earnings revisions are going to […]
